data: {"generalSituation":"The easterly airstream now affecting the coast of Guangdong will moderate gradually today. The northeast monsoon is expected to reach southern China tomorrow. The weather will be dry and windy in the following few days. An area of low pressure is expected to affect the central and southern parts of the South China Sea over the weekend. Another area of low pressure over the western North Pacific to the east of the Philippines will bring unsettled weather to the region in the latter part of this week, and edge closer to the vicinity of the Philippines in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251030","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy with one or two light rain patches.
